Name: Ship Fight
About the game: Set sail and battle it out! Fight the unforgiving single-player mode, share your glory with up to four players in cooperative, or turn against your allies in versus. 2D shoot-em-up with four difficulty levels, many unique enemies, and several boss fights This is no bullet hell; make your shots count against enemies who seek you out Enhance your ship with upgrades like a super-fast missile and a proximity mine Don't like fighting alone? Up to three other friends can join the battle in cooperative mode Want competition? Fight among yourselves in the action-packed versus mode Ready? Ship Fight!
Meta Title: Ship Fight: Jan 7, 2019, FSG games and Full Overview
